html: I appreciated hearing from local members of the Corps and Holt & Atchison County officials. I will continue working with the state to make sure federal support is available where it’s needed & there are no federal hurdles holding up recovery efforts.
text: I appreciated hearing from local members of the Corps and Holt & Atchison County officials. I will continue working with the state to make sure federal support is available where it’s needed & there are no federal hurdles holding up recovery efforts.

html: The most immediate need we have now is to rebuild levees & move forward on other recovery efforts. Our farms, highways, energy plants & small businesses are essential to our economy & ability to compete. We need to get them up & running as soon as possible.
text: The most immediate need we have now is to rebuild levees & move forward on other recovery efforts. Our farms, highways, energy plants & small businesses are essential to our economy & ability to compete. We need to get them up & running as soon as possible.

html: After seeing the damage today, it is clear that plan needs to be looked at. The Corps should be prioritizing flood control, navigation, and drinking water. Environmental concerns are a part of that discussion, but the priority should always be on protecting people and property.
text: After seeing the damage today, it is clear that plan needs to be looked at. The Corps should be prioritizing flood control, navigation, and drinking water. Environmental concerns are a part of that discussion, but the priority should always be on protecting people and property.

html: The flooding in Northwest Missouri has been completely catastrophic for a lot of families, farms & local infrastructure. For more than 15 years, I've said the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers’ river management plan is not the right plan for Missouri.

text:
Sent a letter to the @NCAA asking them to take another look at the penalties levied against the @Mizzou athletics program.

These sanctions negatively and directly punish student-athletes and coaches who had nothing to do with the charges, and could deter future self-reporting.
